Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • Device

  • public class Device
extends Object
    Resource-locking device with circular bit storage.
    Version:
    2.1.4
    Author:
    Jody Paul

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PEEKS
      Default number of bits to reveal per peek.
      static int DEFAUT_SIZE
      Default number of bits stored.
      static char VALUE_FALSE
      Character indicator of false.
      static char VALUE_TRUE
      Character indicator of true.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Device()
      Constructs device using defaults.

      Construct device with specified bits for testing.

      Construct device with specified size and number of peek/poke bits.

      • Device

        Device()
        Constructs device using defaults.

      • Device

        Device(boolean[] intialBits,
       int bitsPerPeek)
        Construct device with specified bits for testing.
        Parameters:
        intialBits - the number of bits stored in this device
        bitsPerPeek - the number of bits to disclose via peek or set via poke

      • Device

        Device(int size,
       int bitsPerPeek)
        Construct device with specified size and number of peek/poke bits.
        Parameters:
        size - the bit values for this test device
        bitsPerPeek - the number of bits to disclose via peek or set via poke

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)

      • peek

        public CharSequence peek(CharSequence pattern)
        Peek at bits of device.
        Parameters:
        pattern - indicating which bits to show as '?'
        Returns:
        a pattern that discloses the values of the indicated bits

      • poke

        public void poke(CharSequence pattern)
        Poke bits into device.
        Parameters:
        pattern - indicator of values of bits to poke

      • spin

        public boolean spin()
        Initiate device rotation.
        Returns:
        true if all bits have identical value; false otherwise

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Render device information as a string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        rendering that reveals partial state
